We collect data that you voluntarily provide (name, email, phone) through our forms, as well as technical data (IP, cookies) for the proper functioning of the site.

Your data is processed for: customer relationship management, sending quotes, providing SaaS services, and improving user experience.

In accordance with the GDPR, you have the right to access, rectify, erase, and data portability. You can exercise these rights by contacting us via email.
